centerName: MY LITTLE LANGUAGE SCHOOL, MI PEQUENA ESCUELITA, INC.
permitHolder: MY LITTLE LANGUAGE SCHOOL, MI PEQUENA ESCUELITA, INC.

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result:     Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Reinspection Required; Fines pending

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Permittee/applicant submitted incomplete written safety plan
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to designate/identify a qualified Education Director
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had an age appropriate medical evaluation
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service staff identified/acting as group teachers do not meet the required qualifications of the position
Child care service teaching staff acting as assistant teachers do not meet age and educational requirements
Child care service failed to conduct business and employment reference checks of staff/volunteers
At time of inspection childrens medical files were not provided were incomplete or were not maintained
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service Educational Director failed to arrange and verify in-service training for staff documentation not maintained or not available
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
